bioAsHtml: Markus is Scala Lead at MOIA. As a Scala enthusiast, his focus is to design and build distributed systems based on Akka. He is a very active member of the German Scala community, co-organizing hackathons and user groups in Hamburg and Berlin. Markus is also the co-founder and former CTO of Y-Combinator funded startup.

acceptedTalks.title: Managing an Akka Cluster on Kubernetes
